CalculatedItem.name: bi1863
CalculatedItem.label: Sample explanation text
CalculatedItem.Expression: cond(and(eq(${bi1400,binned},'GLOBAL'),and(eq(${bi1401,binned},'GLOBAL ECONOMY'),eq(${bi1402,binned},'All respondents'))),'The first Global Business Barometer reading at the global level is grim. The global economy is expected to be “much worse” over the next three months.',cond(and(eq(${bi1400,binned},'GLOBAL'),and(eq(${bi1401,binned},'GLOBAL ECONOMY'),eq(${bi1402,binned},'North America'))),'Executives in North America are the least pessimistic about the near-term outlook for their industries and their companies, but their views are mostly in line on the global economy.','Quisque morbi ante lobortis erat, nostrum odio a. Ultricies sed integer magna mi adipiscing, aliquam nunc ornare. Pretium bibendum dui libero, pellentesque in auctor. Mauris vel vestibulum eros, convallis hymenaeos at elementum hymenaeos lacus volutpat.'))

DefaultValue.String: Executives in Asia are concerned in line with global opinions, but the region’s barometer readings were lifted by China, which local respondents seem to believe is not far from turning a corner.
